title: Countdown to Death
description: Ten strangers are lured to a remote Scottish island at the invitation of a reclusive industrialist.Stranded on Lord Blackâ€™s wondrous estate, the disparate guests have more in common than they first realize.Accused in a mysterious letter of having committed crimes in their past, one by one they are hunted down. But who is the killer? Will any of them live to find out?***A modern retelling of the Agatha Christie classic--with a surprising twist.***
author: Iain McChesney
